title: Read 10 pages
description: Fuel your brain with new ideas.

title: Take a 10-minute walk
description: Boost your mood and refresh your energy.

title: Write down 3 things you're grateful for
description: Practice daily gratitude to reset your mindset.

title: Do 20 push-ups
description: Get the blood flowing and push your limits.

title: Meditate for 5 minutes
description: Close your eyes, breathe deeply, and clear your mind.

title: Drink 2 liters of water
description: Hydration = better brain function and energy.

title: Text someone and say something kind
Try a new productivity tool or app
description: Experiment with tech that boosts your workflow.

title: Write a micro-journal entry (1 min)
description: Dump your thoughts. No filter. Just write.

title: Learn one weird fact
description: Impress someone today with random knowledge.

title: Listen to a new music genre
description: Open your ears to sonic chaos.

title: Avoid social media for 1 hour
description: Reclaim your brain. Avoid the scroll trap.
